hero.name: Mateo Gheeraert
hero.bio: A 21-year-old software developer from Merkem, Belgium with almost five years of experience in software development. I'm passionate about turning ideas into real, usable digital solutions. I love building things that work well and look great.

education.title: Education & Skills
education.content: I graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Applied Computer Sciences from VIVES University of Applied Sciences in Kortrijk, where I specialized in Software Engineering. During my studies, I mastered JavaScript, React, Node.js, Java, C#, Kotlin, Swift, and Angular. I work with both SQL and NoSQL databases, and I'm especially proficient with MongoDB for most of my personal projects.

leadership.title: Leadership & Community
leadership.content: Outside of school, I'm very involved in youth work as the president of KLJ Merkem. I organize events, lead a fantastic team of volunteers, and even built our official website kljmerkem.be. Being in this role has taught me a lot about leadership, teamwork, and staying creative — skills that I bring into every software project I work on.

experience.title: Technical Experience
experience.content: Over the years, I've mastered a wide range of technical challenges and gained extensive experience with modern web technologies. I have deep expertise in React and Next.js for frontend development, building responsive and performant user interfaces. On the backend, I'm proficient with Node.js and Spring Boot for creating robust APIs and server-side applications. I've also explored NestJS for scalable backend architectures. During my internship, I gained valuable experience working with various AI tools and APIs, including OpenAI, Gemini, and Claude, as well as specialized tools like ComfyUI for AI-powered image enhancement. I've successfully deployed containerized fullstack applications using Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines, demonstrating my ability to handle complete development lifecycles.

learning.title: Always Learning, Always Building
learning.content_intro: I'm always exploring new technologies, always building, and always learning. Whether it's experimenting with UX improvements, optimizing performance, or writing clean and scalable code — I care deeply about the quality of what I create.
learning.content_outro: Thanks for visiting my portfolio! If you're curious about what I've built so far, head over to the Projects page. Want to chat or collaborate? You can reach out via the Contact page. I also share some thoughts and lessons learned on my Blog.

internship.title: Full-Stack AI Developer Internship
internship.description: Completed a comprehensive 50-day internship where I successfully integrated multiple cutting-edge AI APIs including OpenAI, Google Vertex AI, Gemini, and Claude into their web platform. Worked extensively with AI image enhancement tools like ComfyUI, developing intelligent solutions that significantly improved user experiences and platform capabilities.
